Pittsburgh.Panther Hollow Lake:
Panther Hollow Lake is a man-made lake in Schenley Park in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.


== Watershed ==
The lake serves as a catch basin for the 300-acre (120 ha) Panther Hollow Watershed, which includes sections of Schenley Park and Squirrel Hill. It receives storm drain from the watershed, which it sends to the Monongahela River via the Four Mile Run.
